content: You remember how I told you not to call me names? And then immediately told you I didn’t mind? That was me being weak for you from the start. You were teasing, playful, and so charming without trying. We didn’t even talk for long that day, but it stuck that casual way you said, 'Can I call just for a sec? I wanna hear you speak.' You had no idea how much that meant. I was surrounded by family in the room but still smiling like a fool under the blanket because you made me feel seen in such a loud world. And somehow, I already felt safe.
